forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun casts a hopeful warmth over Downtown San Francisco, whispering promises of clarity amid the lingering presence of a soft marine layer. The sky, a dance of blues and whites, hints at a day that may be punctuated by the playful gusts of wind sailing down from the west-southwest. Even as the temperature hovers around a mild 61°F, a gentle chill may remind residents that this is San Francisco—a city of atmospheric contrasts. 

As evening approaches, the clouds gather in a tender embrace, ushering in a partly cloudy night with temperatures dipping to a cozy 50°F. With a light wind blowing, the cityscape will soon surrender to the comforts of home or the inviting glow of neighborhood cafés. Attire should blend warmth with the cool breeze—perhaps a light jacket over layers that can be shed as the day evolves. This weather offers a lovely opportunity to navigate the streets on foot, perhaps indulging in a leisurely stroll through a nearby park or visiting a local bookstore to escape into the world of words as the horizon dims.
